arg.g: around the Palestinian president Yasir Arafat
the circle of associates who are demanding that the Authority undertake radical reforms in the management structure.

example.arg: دائِرَةُ المُقَرَّبِينَ الَّذِينَ يُطالِبُونَ السُّلْطَةَ بِإِجْراءِ إِصْلاحاتٍ جِذْرِيَّةٍ فِي هَيْكَلِيَّةِ الإِدارَةِ .
